title: Reading Zen and the Art of Motorcycle Maintenance - Chapter 17
description:
#zen_and_the_art_of_motorcycle_maintenance
The mountain figures prominently in this chapter, and the Quality approach to writing continues to be explored. The narrator continues to be concerned about Chris and tries to determine the problem.
